All Implemented Interfaces:
FutureCallback<E,FutureCallbackTask<E>>, Runnable, Future<E>, RunnableFuture<E>
public class FutureCallbackTask<E>
extends FutureTask<E>
implements FutureCallback<E,FutureCallbackTask<E>>

Basic implementation of FutureCallback based on FutureTask.

Author:
jeremy

Method Detail

addResultListener

public FutureCallbackTask<E> addResultListener(FutureListener<E> listener)
Description copied from interface: FutureCallback
Register a listener for this deferred result. If the result is already available, the listener may be called synchronously, so you should generally avoid any blocking code in the callback.

Specified by:
addResultListener in interface FutureCallback<E,FutureCallbackTask<E>>
Parameters:
listener - The listener object

succeed

public FutureCallbackTask<E> succeed(E result_)
Description copied from interface: FutureCallback
Notify listeners that a result is available. Returns the current FutureCallbackTask instance to allow simple synchronous returns when the result is already available:
return new FutureCallbackTask
